title: Sect
description: You are part of an ancient, secret order that slays monsters. Where are they from? How old are they? Are they religious? Why do they stay secret? How do they recruit?

title: Good Standing (+Charm)
description: When you are in good standing with your Sect, at the beginning of each mystery, roll +Charm.

outcomes.text: They provide some useful info or help in the field.
You get a mission associated with the mystery, and if you do it you'll get some info or help too.
They ask you to do something bad. If you fail a mission or refuse an order, you'll be in trouble with the Sect until you atone.

submoves.title: Starting Moves
submoves.description: You get this move and 3 others of your choice below

title: Ancient Fighting Arts
description: When using an old-fashioned hand weapon, you inflict +1 harm and get +1 whenever you roll **protect someone**.

title: Mystic
description: Every time you successfully **use magic**, take +1 forward.

title: Fortunes (+Weird)
description: The Sect has ancient prophecies or divination techniques to predict the future. Once per mystery, you may use them. If you look at what the future holds, roll +Weird.

bullets: Be somewhere you are needed, just in time.
Take +1 forward, or give +1 forward to another hunter.
Retroactively warn someone about an attack, so that it doesn't happen.

outcomes.text: You get bad information and the Keeper decides how that affects you.

title: Sacred Oath
description: You may bind yourself to a single goal, forsaking something during your quest (e.g. speech, all sustenance but bread and water, alcohol, lying, sex, etc). Get the Keeper's agreement on this—it should match the goal in importance and difficulty. While you keep your oath and work towards your goal, mark experience at the end of every session and get +1 on any rolls that directly help achieve the goal. If you break the oath, take -1 ongoing until you have atoned.

title: Mentor (+Sharp)
description: You have a mentor in the Sect: name them __mentor_name:Mentor Name__. When you contact your mentor for info, roll +Sharp.

outcomes.text: You get an answer to your question, no problem.
You choose: they're either busy and can't help, or they answer the question but you owe a favour.

title: Apprentice
description: You have an apprentice: name them. Your job is to teach them the Sect's ways. They count as an ally: subordinate (motivation: to follow your instructions to the letter).

title: Helping Hand
description: When you successfully **help out** another hunter, they get +2 instead of the usual +1.

title: That Old Black Magic
description: When you **use magic**, you can ask a question from the **investigate a mystery** move as your effect.

title: Old Fashioned Weapons
description: If your Sect has fighting arts or obsolete gear then pick three old-fashioned weapons, otherwise pick two:
pick: Big axe (3-harm hand messy slow heavy)

title: Modern Weapons
description: If your Sect has *modernised* or *nifty gadgets*, you make take two modern weapons, otherwise pick one:

submoves.title: Armour
submoves.description: You also get old-fashioned armour (1-armour heavy).

title: Improvement
description: When you have filled all five experience boxes, you level up. Erase the marks and pick from below.
pick: Get command of your chapter of the Sect
Get a Sect team under your command
Take a move from another playbook
Take a move from another playbook

title: Advanced Improvements
description: After you have leveled up *five* times, you additionally qualify for advanced improvements.
pick: Change this hunter to a new type
Create a second hunter to play as well as this one
Mark two of the basic moves as advanced
Mark another two of the basic moves as advanced
Become the leader, or effective leader, of the whole Sect
Get back one used Luck point
